Your health and wellbeing matter to us, and we want to ensure you have the support you need when you need it. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re introducing Talktime, a confidential online therapy platform now included in your medical insurance benefits in the UAE.

To help you get started, weâ€™re hosting live webinar sessions where weâ€™ll walk you through the sign-up process, explain how reimbursement works, and answer any questions you may have.

Calendar invites will be out soon â€“ we encourage you to join and see how Talktime can support you.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Creating Impact Together

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=420&user=10620> 	
Our Omni Channel team made a real impact by spending half a day with POD students from Senses Centerâ€”a beautiful experience filled with learning, laughter, and connection.Engaging with these incredible students reminded us of the power of inclusion and the importance of giving back to our community. A big thank you to everyone who took part in making this day special!
Our Omni Channel team had a another heartwarming experience spending time with POD students from Senses Center during a visit to Dubai Safari Park. Each volunteer was paired with a POD student, fostering meaningful connections while exploring wildlife and nature together.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=422&user=10620> 	
We had a memorable Connect with Nature event, bringing together 240 participants, including both children and adults, for an immersive experience in the great outdoors.

We had a memorable Connect with Nature event, bringing together 240 participants, including both children and adults, for an immersive experience in the great outdoors. The day was packed with engaging activities designed to foster a deeper appreciation for nature and sustainability, including: Guided Nature Walk,  Eco-Craft Workshops, Wildlife Awareness Sessions, Tree Planting & Sustainability Talks and Interactive SDG Games & Challenges
